mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GS_SEND_SCHDL(MASTER_SCHDL_ID, SCHDL_NAME, SENDER, FILE_PATH, SEND_GUBUN, SEND_TYPE, SEND_FLAG, RESERVE_DATE, REG_DATE) VALUES(#{realtime.masterSchdlId}, #{realtime.schdlName}, #{realtime.sender}, #{realtime.filePath}, #{realtime.sendGubun}, #{realtime.sendType}, #{realtime.sendFlag}, SYSDATE(), SYSDATE())
